text: Elizabeth Larrabee Norment (December 31, 1952 – October 13, 2014) was an American actress best known for her role as Nancy Kaufberger in the Netflix series House of Cards. She attended Yale University, and had performed in several theater roles before moving into television. She died of cancer at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center in New York City, aged 61. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Role !
